scripts.dev-deploy: aws lambda invoke --function-name static-sites-pipeline-deploy-lambda --invocation-type Event --cli-binary-format raw-in-base64-out --payload '{ "app-name": "spaceblobman", "environment": "dev" }' response.json
scripts.prod-deploy: aws lambda invoke --function-name static-sites-pipeline-deploy-lambda --invocation-type Event --cli-binary-format raw-in-base64-out --payload '{ "app-name": "spaceblobman", "environment": "prod" }' response.json
